category.name: Product Structure.RDV
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDV_platformdesigner_assign_bulk_variability
preference.preference_description: Determines if the user can add and remove variability on the product context in bulk with Platform Designer. Valid Values: true - The user can add and remove variability on the product context in bulk. false - The user cannot add and remove variability on the product context in bulk.
